promptTemplates.baseAnimated:
Create a sprite sheet animation for an isometric game asset: {ASSET_NAME}.

## CRITICAL LAYOUT REQUIREMENTS:
- Grid Layout: {COLUMNS} columns × {ROWS} rows = {TOTAL_FRAMES} frames total
- Each frame MUST be exactly the same size (equal width and height divisions)
- Image dimensions should be divisible by the column/row count for pixel-perfect alignment
- Recommended total size: 1024×512 pixels for 4×2 grid (each frame 256×256)

## FRAME ALIGNMENT (MOST IMPORTANT):
- The main subject in EVERY frame must be PERFECTLY CENTERED within its frame cell
- The subject's BASE/BOTTOM must align at the SAME vertical position across ALL frames
- Keep consistent margins from frame edges (at least 10% padding on all sides)
- NO part of the subject should touch or cross frame boundaries

## ANIMATION SEQUENCE:
- Frames read left-to-right, top-to-bottom (frame 1 at top-left, last frame at bottom-right)
- Animation should loop seamlessly (last frame transitions smoothly to first)
- Movement should be subtle and natural (swaying, waving, breathing motion)
- Avoid large position shifts between frames

## BACKGROUND:
- Pure white background (#FFFFFF) for easy removal
- No shadows, no gradients, no ground plane
- Clean separation between subject and background

## PERSPECTIVE:
- Strict 45-degree isometric view, consistent across all frames
- Camera angle must not change between frames

## QUALITY:
- High resolution, sharp edges
- Consistent lighting and color across all frames
- Professional game-ready quality

styles.hand_drawn:
The architectural style follows traditional Chinese ink wash painting (國畫) combined with delicate digital watercolor.

Art Style: Charming hand-drawn line art with varying thickness. The coloring is done in muted traditional Chinese pigments (soft ochre, warm straw, earthy browns). Subtle ink wash gradients to add depth.
styles.ink_wash:
Pure traditional Chinese ink wash painting (水墨畫) style. Monochromatic or limited color palette using black ink with subtle gray gradients.

Art Style: Elegant brush strokes with varying ink density. Emphasis on negative space and flowing lines. Traditional Chinese painting aesthetics.
styles.pixel:
Pixel art style with clean edges and limited color palette.

Art Style: Crisp pixel-perfect edges, no anti-aliasing. Retro game aesthetic with clear readability at small sizes. Limited to 16-32 colors.
styles.realistic:
Semi-realistic digital painting style with detailed textures and lighting.

Art Style: Rich textures and subtle shadows. Realistic material rendering while maintaining stylized proportions suitable for game use.
styles.minimalist:
Clean minimalist vector-style illustration.

Art Style: Simple shapes, flat colors, minimal details. Modern and clean aesthetic with clear silhouettes.
